result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Patrick M. Eaton

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:01AM Cases called 22CF1019 & 22CM673. Defendant Patrick M. Eaton appeared by video, in custody from the Eau Claire County Jail.  Attorney Kerry A. Kelm appeared by video for Patrick M. Eaton.  Attorney Matthew Kirkpatrick appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives right to appear in person. Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas. 

Defense has filed a Motion to Modify Bond. State objects to a modification at this time as Defendant is still contacting victim which is a violation of bond. Defense has no additional information to provide. Court denies the Defense Motion to Modify Bond at this time. 

Both cases: 11/14/22 at 11am. 30 minutes via Zoom.

9:30 AM Cases called: 22CF1019 & 22CM673. Defendant Patrick M. Eaton in court, in custody.  Attorney Kerry A. Kelm in court for Patrick M. Eaton.  Attorney Afton Brianna Lewis in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant waives right to a Preliminary Hearing in 22CF1019 and Court accepts waiver and binds matter over. Case referred to Br. 3 for further scheduling. 22CM673 will ride along. 
The Motion to Modify Bond will be addressed in Br. 3 as well.

9:36 AM cases 22CF1019, 22CM673 called. Defendant Patrick M. Eaton not in court, in custody.  Attorney Kerry A. Kelm in court for Patrick M. Eaton.  Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Hearing scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 09:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: CK 44167 mailed to defendant; signature bond ordered, bail posted refunded.

Conditions:
No contact with M.F. or M.F.'s residence.
Defendant allowed to retrieve belongings one time if accompanied by a law enforcement officer.
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level.

(11:47 AM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Patrick M. Eaton in court without counsel.
Defendant waives formal reading of the complaint.
Defendant advised of right to an attorney. 
Defendant updates phone number with the Court.
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on August 29, 2022 at 3:15 pm.
Hearing scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Conditions:
No contact with M.F. or M.F.'s residence.
Defendant allowed to retrieve belongings one time if accompanied by a law enforcement officer.
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level.
